items.name: Component_IntervalTimer
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_IntervalTimer
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_IntervalTimer extends gs.Component
    ###*
    * A component which adds timing-features to a game object. The game object
    * will send an "elapsed" event everytime the time interval has been elapsed.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_IntervalTimer
    * @extends gs.Component
    * @memberof gs
    ###
    constructor: ->
        super()
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the timer is running. 
        *
        * @property isRunning
        * @type boolean
        * @readOnly
        ###
        @isRunning = no
        
        ###*
        * @property frameCount
        * @type number
        * @private
        ###
        @frameCount = 0
        
        ###*
        * The interval at which the associated action will be executed.
        * @property interval
        * @type number
        ###
        @interval = 0
        
    ###*
    * Starts the timer. 
    *
    * @method start
    ###
    start: -> 
        @isRunning = yes
        @frameCount = 0
     
    ###*
    * Stops the timer. 
    *
    * @method stop
    ###   
    stop: -> @isRunning = no
    
    ###*
    * Resumes the timer. 
    *
    * @method resume
    ###
    resume: -> @isRunning = yes
    
    ###*
    * Pauses the timer. 
    *
    * @method pause
    ###
    pause: -> @isRunning = no
        
    ###*
    * Updates the timer.
    *
    * @method update
    ###
    update: ->
        if @isRunning
            @frameCount++
            
            if @frameCount >= @interval
                @object.events.emit("elapsed", @object)
                @frameCount = 0
            
        
            

        
 
gs.Component_IntervalTimer = Component_IntervalTimer
